definitions.definition: ( derogatory , sometimes offensive ) A cheat or swindle ; a rip-off .
examples: Why do we have to buy this new edition of the textbook when there’s almost no difference between it and the previous one? What a gyp !

definitions.definition: Synonym of gypsy ( “ contra dance step ” ) .

main_definition: ( derogatory , sometimes offensive ) A cheat or swindle ; a rip-off .
secondary_definitions: Synonym of gypsy ( “ contra dance step ” ) .

definitions.definition: ( Cambridge University , Durham University , historical ) A domestic servant , generally male, who would attend upon (usually several) students, brushing their clothes, carrying parcels, waiting at parties and other tasks; generally equivalent to a scout in the historical sense at Oxford University or a skip at Trinity College, Dublin .
( Cambridge University , Durham University ) The room in which such college servants work.
( Cambridge University , Durham University ) A small kitchen for use by college students .
